{"id":1582576726,"question_id":3348,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"7 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1742669956,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"107 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1582576726/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Cost Walk in Weighted Graph","memory":"225.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    struct DSU {\n        vector<int> e, a;\n        void init(int N) {\n            e = vector<int>(N,-1);\n            a = vector<int>(N,-1); // all 1s in bitwise\n        }\n        int get(int x) {\n            if (e[x] < 0)\n                return x;\n            return e[x] = get(e[x]);\n        }\n        int size(int x) {\n            return -e[get(x)];\n        }\n        bool unite(int x, int y, int weight) {\n            x = get(x), y = get(y);\n            if (e[x] > e[y])\n                swap(x, y);\n            a[x] &= weight & a[y];\n            if (x == y)\n                return 0;\n            e[x] += e[y];\n            e[y] = x;\n            return 1;\n        }\n    };\n\n    vector<int> minimumCost(int n, vector<vector<int>>& edges, vector<vector<int>>& query) {\n        DSU d; d.init(n);\n        for (auto i : edges) \n            d.unite(i[0], i[1], i[2]);\n        \n        vector<int> ans;\n        for (auto q : query) {\n            if (d.get(q[0]) == d.get(q[1]))\n                ans.push_back(d.a[d.get(q[0])]);\n            else ans.push_back(-1);\n        }\n\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-cost-walk-in-weighted-graph","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1070}
